sys_script_include.name: EventUtils

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_d8dc27ab830b2210de39f120feaad3c7
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1790195_event_ma.EventUtils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>EventUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var EventUtils = Class.create();
EventUtils.prototype = {
    initialize: function(eventid) {
        this.eventid = eventid;
    },
    getDetailsByID: function() {
        var res = [];
        var event = new GlideRecord('x_1790195_event_ma_event_record');
        event.addQuery('number', this.eventid);
        event.query();
        while (event.next()) {
            res.push({
                eventid: event.getDisplayName('number'),
                eventName: event.getValue('x_event_name'),
                eventDate: event.getValue('x_event_date'),
                location: event.getValue('x_location')

            });
        }
        return JSON.stringify(res);
    },
    isVip: function() {
        var event = new GlideRecord('x_1790195_event_ma_event_record');
        event.addQuery('number', this.eventid);
        event.query();
        if (event.next()) {
            if (event.getValue('x_vip'))
                return true;
        }
        return false;
    },
    remainingBudget: function() {
        var event = new GlideRecord('x_1790195_event_ma_budget');
        event.addQuery('number', this.eventid);
        event.query();
        if (event.next()) {
            event.x_amount_remaining = event.getValue('x_total_budget') - event.getValue('x_amount_spent');

            event.update();
        }
    },
    getEventTasks:function() {
        var res = [];
        var eventtask = new GlideRecord('x_1790195_event_ma_event_task');
        eventtask.addQuery('number', this.eventid);
        eventtask.query();
        if (eventtask.next()) {
            res.push({
                id: eventtask.getDisplayValue()
            });}
            return JSON.stringify(res);
        
    },
	getEventAttendee:function() {
        var res = [];
        var attendee = new GlideRecord('x_1790195_event_ma_attendee');
        attendee.addQuery('number', this.eventid);
        attendee.query();
        if (attendee.next()) {
            res.push({
                id: attendee.getDisplayValue(),
				firstname : attendee.getValue('x_first_name'),
                lastname : attendee.getValue('x_last_name')
            });}
            return JSON.stringify(res);
        
    },
	getEventVendor:function(){
        var res = [];
        var vendor = new GlideRecord('x_1790195_event_ma_vendor');
        vendor.addQuery('number', this.eventid);
        vendor.query();
        if (vendor.next()) {
            res.push({
                id: vendor.getDisplayValue(),
				name : vendor.getValue('x_vendor_name'),
            }); }
            return JSON.stringify(res);
       
    },
	getEventBudget:function(){
        var res = [];
        var budget = new GlideRecord('x_1790195_event_ma_budget');
        budget.addQuery('number', this.eventid);
        budget.query();
        if (budget.next()) {
            res.push({
                id: budget.getDisplayValue(),
				totalBudget : budget.getValue('x_total_budget'),
            });}
            return JSON.stringify(res);
        
    },
	getEventFeedback:function(){
        var res = [];
        var feedback = new GlideRecord('x_1790195_event_ma_feedback');
        feedback.addQuery('number', this.eventid);
        feedback.query();
        if (feedback.next()) {
            res.push({
                id: feedback.getDisplayValue(),
				rating : feedback.getValue('x_rating'),
            });}
            return JSON.stringify(res);
        
    },

    type: 'EventUtils'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-08-05 14:23:54</sys_created_on><sys_id>d8dc27ab830b2210de39f120feaad3c7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>EventUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Event Management &amp; Planning System" source="x_1790195_event_ma">133c05db83032210de39f120feaad3a8</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Event Management &amp; Planning System">133c05db83032210de39f120feaad3a8</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_d8dc27ab830b2210de39f120feaad3c7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-08-05 14:41:59</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
